verbs.description: [ARG1: Stone , a longtime advisor to Trump ,] [V: is] [ARG2: one of the top subjects of the Mueller investigation into potential collusion between the Kremlin and the Trump campaign] , sources told CNBC .

Stone , a longtime advisor to Trump , is one of the top subjects of the Mueller investigation into potential collusion between the Kremlin and the Trump campaign , [ARG0: sources] [V: told] [ARG2: CNBC] .
